part1subtitle: WE ARE READY FOR SERVING YOU
part1content: Welcome to the services page, feel free to contact us or our branch office during work time, or you're able to write a message to us in the form below as you wish.

part2data.title: VIP 1 on 1
part2data.content: Click the link below to enjoy the customer 1 on 1 privilege service online.

part2data.title: Money Back Service
part2data.content: Customize Money Back Package for VIP customers, you can earn more than you paid after 18 months trial.

part2data.title: Free Shipping
part2data.content:
We offer free shipping service for customers. Consult the front counter for further details please.

Work time: Mon-Sun. 12:00 - 20:00 GST

part2data.title: Item Recycling Service
part2data.content: Free collect the recycled items as you wish. Go to the specific channel to take action on it.

part2data.title: Free Callback
part2data.content: Send request and get a call back with no charge. We offer your any information that you need.

part4data.title: What can we know within the website?
part4data.content: You can get information about our history, news and bunch of amazing products.

part4data.title: Why did I ask a such stupid question?
part4data.content: You know who you are...You should know that, we would do something stupid sometimes.

part4data.title: Would anyone else see my stupid question?
part4data.content: Of course YES. you know we can never cover fire with paper.

part4data.title: Okay, I admit I am a idiot. But why did you create a such stupid section though?
part4data.content: Ummm...I have to say that, sometimes I am a idiot too.
